meanings.definition: To move up and down with short, quick motions.
meanings.sent1: The car began to jounce on the bumpy road.
meanings.sent2: The children love to jounce on the trampoline.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's tail started to jounce excitedly when its owner returned home.
meanings.sent4: The leaves jounce in the wind, creating a mesmerizing dance.
meanings.sent5: The basketball seemed to jounce endlessly on the court.

meanings.sent1: The sudden jounce of the train woke up the sleeping passenger.
meanings.sent2: The jounce of the ball against the wall echoed in the room.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected jounce of the elevator made everyone gasp.
meanings.sent4: The jounce of the earthquake sent ripples through the water.
meanings.sent5: The jounce of the rollercoaster made everyone scream with excitement.
